title: Photo Review Dashboard
description: Review and manage photo submissions for the contest

mySubmissions.title: My Submissions
mySubmissions.heading: My Photo Submissions
mySubmissions.description: View and manage your contest photo submissions
mySubmissions.empty: You haven't submitted any photos yet
mySubmissions.emptyDescription: You haven't uploaded any photos for the contest.
mySubmissions.statusPending: Your photo is awaiting review by contest administrators.
mySubmissions.statusApproved: Your photo has been approved and is entered in the contest!
mySubmissions.statusDeclined: This submission was not accepted. You can upload a new photo in this slot.

empty.title: No submissions found
empty.pending: There are no pending submissions to review at the moment. Check back later!
empty.approved: No approved submissions yet. Start reviewing to see approved photos here.
empty.declined: No declined submissions yet. Declined photos will appear here.
empty.all: No photo submissions have been made yet. They will appear here once users start uploading.
